name: Crepes
title: Crepes
instructions: Melt most of the butter in a pan or in the microwave
Mix the liquid ingredients in a bowl: melted butter, eggs and milk
Add the flour, sugar and salt
Mix together with a whisk, until you have a batter
Put a bit of butter in a pan on medium-high heat
Ladel spoons of batter into the pan. When one side is cooked and the edges start to brown, flip the pancake over
Serve with sweet or salty condiments. Enjoy :)
